name: Leather Key Strap
description:
- These straps are one of a kind and extremely durable. Imagine your foot as your keys, inside a bear trap. 

- Each strap is made from 100% raw cowhide. Then hand treated by myself for a unique timeless finish. Daily wear and scratches will occur and show beautifully for years to come. 

- These are made to order the moment you purchase and shipped that day. So please do not be alarmed when your strap arrives in two days instead of several weeks later. 

- I ship Internationally

name: Single Handed Split Leather Camera Strap
description:
Handmade here in San Francisco. 

- The one handed strap is versatile and simple. Loose the huge camera strap with its cumbersome length and girth. Keep your camera on your wrist while hiking through the wilderness to lightning quick capture that wild puma. (or a tarantula, whatever)

- The split leather allows the strap to conform to your wrist

- These straps are one of a kind and extremely durable. You wont have to think twice about the safety of your $1159.99 vintage Lecia m3. 

- Each strap is made from 100% raw cowhide. Then hand treated by myself for a unique timeless finish. Daily wear and scratches will occur and show beautifully for years to come. 

- These are made to order the moment you purchase and shipped that day. So please do not be alarmed when your strap arrives in two days instead of several weeks later. 

Color: Brown 
Strap Width: 0.5" (1.27 cm)
Strap Length: 8" (20.32 cm)
Slot attachment: Swivel Hook

- Will attach to any and all cameras including: SLR, DSLR, Rangefinders, Point and shoots, anything with a strap hole.

- I ship Internationally
